archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.3b: b) verifying that transactional areas and directories of files on web servers are not indexable (i.e. files are not accessible by search engines, web crawlers or similar indexing systems)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
